info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:57AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON... SOUTHWESTERN BEAVER...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 530 AM EDT... At 456 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Follansbee, or over Steubenville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, Wellsburg, Avella, Toronto, Wintersville, Mingo Junction, Follansbee, Hooverson Heights, New Cumberland, Shippingport, and Burgettstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
